title: Breath
description: What do you do when your desire is stronger than you are?College freshman Elizabeth Foster is beginning to come to terms with her attraction to disabled men but she fears others might judge her harshly if they knew.And that's exactly what happens.When her mother learns the truth, she does everything in her power to stop Elizabeth from finding the only kind of man she could love.Now Elizabeth must learn to trust herself and reject her parents' vision for her future.(This book is the sequel to the novel, (W)hole, but it also stands on its own.)
author: Ruth Madison
